trans-unit.source: Specifies the audit behavior of security events.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o comportamento de auditoria de eventos de segurança.

trans-unit.source: In general, the security events consist of authentication events such as transport, message or negotiate authentication and authorization event.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, os eventos de segurança, consistem em eventos de autenticação, tais como o transporte de mensagem ou negociar eventos de autenticação e autorização.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The instance is created with the following default settings: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.AuditLogLocation%2A> = <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation>; - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.SuppressAuditFailure%2A> = `true`; - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.ServiceAuthorizationAuditLevel%2A> = <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel>; - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.MessageAuthenticationAuditLevel%2A> = <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel>.
trans-unit.target: A instância é criada com as seguintes predefinições:- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.AuditLogLocation%2A>= <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation>; - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.SuppressAuditFailure%2A> = `true`; - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.ServiceAuthorizationAuditLevel%2A> = <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel>; - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.MessageAuthenticationAuditLevel%2A> = <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel></xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.MessageAuthenticationAuditLevel%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel></xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.ServiceAuthorizationAuditLevel%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.SuppressAuditFailure%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation></xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.AuditLogLocation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location where secure-related event logs are written.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a localização onde os registos de eventos relacionados com o secure são escritos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_value" name="value" href=""></xref> are not valid members of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref>e <xref uid="langword_csharp_value" name="value" href=""> </xref> não são membros válidos <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of authentication events to audit at the message level.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de eventos de autenticação para auditar ao nível da mensagem.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_value" name="value" href=""></xref> are not valid members of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref>e <xref uid="langword_csharp_value" name="value" href=""> </xref> não são membros válidos <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of authorization events to audit at the service level.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de eventos de autorização para auditar a nível de serviço.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_value" name="value" href=""></xref> are not valid members of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref>e <xref uid="langword_csharp_value" name="value" href=""> </xref> não são membros válidos <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether failure to audit affects the application.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a falhas para auditar afeta a aplicação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if failure to audit does not affect the application; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a falhas para auditar não afetam a aplicação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Passes custom data to binding elements to support the contract implementation.
trans-unit.target: Transmite dados personalizados para elementos para suportar a implementação de contrato de enlace.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to add custom data objects to the `parameters` collection that binding elements can use to acquire extra information to enable them to support the contract.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para adicionar objetos de dados personalizados para o `parameters` coleção de elementos de enlace podem utilizar para obter informações adicionais para as ativar suportar o contrato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> of the service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> do serviço.

trans-unit.source: The host of the service.
trans-unit.target: O anfitrião do serviço.

trans-unit.source: The service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Os pontos finais de serviço.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: and parameters are .
trans-unit.target: and parameters are .

trans-unit.source: Provides the ability to change run-time property values or insert custom extension objects such as error handlers, message or parameter interceptors, security extensions, and other custom extension objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a capacidade de alterar os valores de propriedade de tempo de execução ou inserir extensão personalizado objetos tais como processadores de erro, intercetores de mensagem ou parâmetro, extensões de segurança e outros objetos de extensão personalizado.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to inspect or modify the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> object that is being constructed to support some custom execution scenario.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para inspecionar ou modificar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>objeto que está a ser construído para suportar o cenário algumas execução personalizado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> of the service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> do serviço.

trans-unit.target: O anfitrião do serviço.

trans-unit.target: serviceHostBaseis .

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Não implementado.
